rows.label: tev020101_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020101_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Ajoa about conditions on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020101_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020101_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Ajoa if anything is troubling her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020101_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Ajoa about the Biahno water-purification plant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020101_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Ajoa if anything is troubling her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020101_MSG0001
rows.name:
There are a number of lakes near New LA,
but all of them have water-quality issues.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020101_MSG0002
rows.name:
A lake west of here has the best potential as a
reservoir, but it's infected with the X-ii bacterium,
which is native to Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020101_MSG0003
rows.name:
Our research indicates that if we were to drink that
water for an extended period of time, it would
begin to rot our insides.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020101_MSG0004
rows.name:
So if we're to have potable water here, we're going
to need a large-scale water-purification facility.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020101_MSG0005
rows.name:
The research team that I'm on has started plans to
build such a water-purification plant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020101_MSG0008
rows.name:
Rosie—a member of my project team—and I
have been at each other's throats over the Biahno
purification plant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020101_MSG0009
rows.name:
I want to immediately construct a water-purification
plant here in Primordia in order to solve New LA's
chronic water shortages.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020101_MSG0010
rows.name: However, Rosie believes my plan is dangerous.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020101_MSG0011
rows.name:
There's no denying the dangers of attempting a project
like this outside of the city. But BLADE operatives are
always risking their lives for the good of mankind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020101_MSG0012
rows.name:
So as researchers, who are we to ignore the best
solution to our problem simply because it involves
working under dangerous circumstances?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020101_MSG0020
rows.name:
The plant has been completed without major incident,
and the purification machinery is operating smoothly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020101_MSG0021
rows.name:
Now we'll be able to extract and transport safe
drinking water from this vast lake to New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020101_MSG0022
rows.name:
No matter how many xenoforms move into the city,
we won't have to worry about water shortages.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020101_MSG0023
rows.name:
Of course, there remain numerous and substantial
barriers to our continued existence here on Mira,
but we're well on our way to solving them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020101_MSG0024
rows.name:
You have my gratitude. We couldn't have done this
without you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020101_MSG0027
rows.name:
With your assistance, we've been able to complete
the Biahno water-purification plant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020101_MSG0028
rows.name:
But I'm still troubled by how much conflict the project
generated between myself and Rosie.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020101_MSG0029
rows.name:
She chose to stay in New LA, so I don't really have
many opportunities to talk to her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020101_MSG0030
rows.name:
But we're still members of the same research team,
so I hope we can work out our differences.[ST:wait ]
